HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: |img:UI/AspectUpdate|Pawnmorpher now has a Discord server! Click 'Link' at the top to join.|WHAT'S NEW?| - Added iTab for mutations, which tracks morph influences, production and 'aspects'. Shows up when a pawn gains a mutation.| - Added log entries for mutations, viewable from the mutation tab.| - Added aspects system, a mix between hediffs and traits so we don't clutter the health tab. Viewable from the tab.| - Added a new trait called 'mutation affinity'. Like transhumanist, but for mutations. Also, Body Purists hate being or seeing mutants now.| - Factions will care if you mutate their people!| - Fur/feather/hide mutations now spread to other parts. |Mech healer serum now also mutates parts it heals.|+ Other various tweaks and bug fixes.|Thank you all for playing and enjoying Pawnmorpher! We'd love to see your unethical madness over on our Discord. :)
